ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | atncvr.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 2 |  | atncvr.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0. ` K ) = ( 0. ` K ) |
| 4 | 3, 2 | #P_atn0 | |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ P e. A ) -> P =/= ( 0. ` K ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> P =/= ( 0. ` K ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 7 | 6, 2 | #P_atbase | |- ( P e. A -> P e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( le ` K ) = ( le ` K ) |
| 9 | 6, 8, 3, 1, 2 | #P_atcvreq0 | |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ P e. ( Base ` K ) /\ Q e. A ) -> ( P C Q <-> P = ( 0. ` K ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_syl3an2 | |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( P C Q <-> P = ( 0. ` K ) ) ) |

| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> -. P C Q ) |
